title: Workplace Navigation and Employment Search During Temporary Vulnerability
description: As a person seeking employment while navigating temporary vulnerability I want tools to find dignified work while avoiding exploitation So that I can build toward economic stability without sacrificing recovery or wellbeing
content:
Feature: Workplace Navigation and Employment Search During Temporary Vulnerability
  As a person seeking employment while navigating temporary vulnerability
  I want tools to find dignified work while avoiding exploitation
  So that I can build toward economic stability without sacrificing recovery or wellbeing

  Background:
    Given I am seeking employment after crisis or during recovery
    And I face employment barriers (resume gaps, childcare constraints, trauma, stigma)
    And I am using the workplace_elohim to navigate employment search and workplace issues
    And I need employment that supports rather than undermines my rebuilding

  Scenario: Presenting employment capabilities despite resume gaps and crisis circumstances
    Given I have gaps in my employment history due to domestic violence and crisis
    And potential employers may discriminate based on gaps or circumstances
    When I apply for employment opportunities
    Then the workplace_elohim helps me present my capabilities effectively
    And provides strategies for explaining employment gaps honestly but strategically
    And helps me articulate transferable skills and competencies
    And recognizes my crisis navigation as demonstrating valuable skills
    And validates that gaps don't erase my professional capability
    And my personal_agent helps me craft application materials
    And tracks my employment search efforts and outcomes
    And celebrates my courage in seeking employment during recovery

  Scenario: Identifying employment opportunities that are genuine versus exploitative
    Given some employers specifically target vulnerable people for exploitation
    And I am vulnerable to accepting exploitative work due to desperation
    When I evaluate employment opportunities
    Then the workplace_elohim helps me assess whether opportunities are exploitative
    And identifies red flags (unpaid "training", illegal pay practices, unsafe conditions, unrealistic expectations)
    And validates that I deserve fair employment, not exploitation
    And helps me decline opportunities that would harm my recovery
    And surfaces genuinely fair employment options
    And my personal_agent alerts me to concerning employer patterns
    And recognizes that protecting myself from exploitation is essential
    And supports me waiting for appropriate opportunity rather than accepting harm

  Scenario: Negotiating employment flexibility for childcare and recovery needs
    Given I need employment flexibility for childcare, therapy, legal appointments, and crisis management
    And employers may resist flexibility or see it as liability
    When I negotiate employment terms
    Then the workplace_elohim helps me request appropriate accommodations
    And provides language for negotiating flexibility professionally
    And helps me understand my legal rights to reasonable accommodation
    And validates that my needs are reasonable and should be accommodated
    And identifies employers more likely to provide needed flexibility
    And my personal_agent coaches me through negotiation conversations
    And recognizes that advocating for my needs is professional strength
    And supports me in finding employment compatible with my life

  Scenario: Managing workplace disclosure about domestic violence or crisis circumstances
    Given employers may ask about gaps, circumstances, or background
    And disclosure could lead to discrimination or could generate support
    When I decide what to disclose to employers
    Then the workplace_elohim helps me evaluate disclosure risks and benefits
    And provides guidance on legal protections against discrimination
    And suggests strategic disclosure approaches when disclosure is beneficial
    And validates my right to privacy about personal circumstances
    And helps me navigate background checks or verification issues
    And my personal_agent reminds me of what I've decided to disclose vs. protect
    And recognizes disclosure decisions as complex risk assessment
    And supports my autonomy in disclosure choices

  Scenario: Coordinating employment search with childcare constraints
    Given I can only work when childcare is available and affordable
    And childcare availability severely limits employment options
    When I search for employment compatible with childcare
    Then the workplace_elohim filters opportunities by schedule and childcare compatibility
    And identifies employers offering childcare support or flexibility
    And helps me calculate whether employment pays enough after childcare costs
    And coordinates employment search with childcare subsidy applications
    And validates that childcare constraints are real barriers, not excuses
    And my personal_agent tracks childcare availability and employment schedule compatibility
    And recognizes that coordinating employment and childcare is complex labor
    And ensures employment genuinely improves rather than worsens my situation

  Scenario: Building toward employment while not currently ready to work
    Given I am still in acute crisis or early trauma recovery
    And employment right now would overwhelm my capacity
    When I plan for future employment while not currently seeking work
    Then the workplace_elohim helps me identify skill-building opportunities
    And surfaces training, education, or credential programs I could pursue
    And validates that not being employment-ready yet is appropriate
    And helps me build toward future employment at my pace
    And tracks my skill development and preparation
    And my personal_agent identifies low-pressure ways to build employment readiness
    And recognizes that recovery before employment is often necessary
    And supports my timeline for employment readiness

  Scenario: Understanding workplace rights and protections as vulnerable worker
    Given I may face workplace discrimination, harassment, or rights violations
    And vulnerable workers are often targeted for workplace abuse
    When I encounter workplace problems or need to understand my rights
    Then the workplace_elohim provides information on my workplace rights
    And helps me identify illegal workplace practices
    And connects me to legal resources or worker advocacy organizations
    And validates that I deserve workplace protection and dignity
    And helps me document workplace problems
    And my personal_agent alerts me to rights violations
    And recognizes that vulnerable workers need extra rights awareness
    And supports me in demanding legal workplace treatment

  Scenario: Accessing employment support services and job training programs
    Given various programs offer employment support for vulnerable populations
    And these programs vary widely in quality and appropriateness
    When I seek employment support services
    Then the workplace_elohim identifies quality employment support programs
    And helps me access job training, resume support, interview coaching
    And evaluates whether programs are genuinely helpful vs. bureaucratic
    And connects me to programs that respect my dignity and capability
    And validates that I deserve quality employment support
    And my personal_agent tracks program applications and requirements
    And recognizes that navigating employment services is labor
    And ensures employment support actually supports rather than burdens me

  Scenario: Managing workplace performance while dealing with ongoing trauma and stress
    Given I am working while still recovering from trauma
    And trauma symptoms may affect my workplace performance
    When trauma impacts my work capability
    Then the workplace_elohim helps me manage performance expectations realistically
    And provides strategies for trauma management in workplace
    And helps me access workplace mental health resources if available
    And validates that trauma affects work capacity and that's normal
    And identifies when workplace environment is retraumatizing
    And my personal_agent reminds me of coping strategies during work stress
    And recognizes that working while traumatized is extraordinarily difficult
    And supports appropriate accommodations or job changes if needed

  Scenario: Evaluating whether employment genuinely supports or undermines stability-building
    Given some employment could undermine rather than support my rebuilding
    And I need work that enables rather than prevents stability
    When I evaluate employment opportunities holistically
    Then the workplace_elohim helps me assess total impact of employment
    And considers financial benefit, schedule compatibility, stress level, childcare impact, recovery support
    And validates that employment should improve my situation, not worsen it
    And helps me identify when employment costs more (financially, emotionally, practically) than it provides
    And my personal_agent evaluates opportunities against my whole situation
    And recognizes that not all employment serves vulnerable people
    And supports me declining employment that would harm my rebuilding

  Scenario: Building professional network and references despite isolation and crisis
    Given professional networking requires time, energy, and social capital I lack
    And I need professional connections for employment opportunities
    When I work to build professional network
    Then the workplace_elohim helps me identify low-barrier networking opportunities
    And suggests strategies for building professional connections despite constraints
    And helps me leverage existing relationships for professional support
    And validates that networking is harder during crisis and that's not my fault
    And connects me to professional networks for people in similar situations
    And my personal_agent identifies networking opportunities matching my capacity
    And recognizes networking efforts as valuable professional development
    And celebrates each professional connection built

  Scenario: Accessing workplace benefits and resources for family stability
    Given employment may provide benefits (health insurance, paid leave, retirement) critical for stability
    And I need to maximize workplace benefits for family wellbeing
    When I evaluate or access workplace benefits
    Then the workplace_elohim helps me understand and maximize available benefits
    And guides enrollment in health insurance, retirement, other benefits
    And identifies workplace resources (EAP, childcare support, emergency assistance)
    And validates that benefits are part of compensation, not "extras"
    And helps me advocate for benefits if employer is unclear about offerings
    And my personal_agent tracks benefit enrollment deadlines and requirements
    And recognizes that benefits navigation is complex invisible labor
    And ensures I access all benefits supporting family stability

  Scenario: Transitioning from temporary assistance to employment without losing critical support prematurely
    Given I receive temporary assistance (SNAP, TANF, housing support, childcare subsidies)
    And employment may affect benefit eligibility
    When I transition from assistance to employment
    Then the workplace_elohim helps me understand benefits cliff dynamics
    And calculates whether employment genuinely improves my financial situation after benefit loss
    And identifies transition supports that prevent benefit cliff harm
    And validates that benefits cliff is policy failure, not my failure
    And helps me time employment transition to minimize harm
    And my personal_agent tracks benefit eligibility thresholds and employment income
    And recognizes that benefits navigation is complex policy navigation labor
    And ensures employment transition genuinely serves rather than harms my family
